sentences.en: A Cancer's emotions can go back and forth very powerfully.
sentences.cn: 巨蟹座的情感起伏强烈.

sentences.en: A large, powerfully - built guy meets a woman at a bar.
sentences.cn: 一位魁梧 、 健壮的男子在酒吧遇到了一位女子.

sentences.en: A world food bank appeals powerfully to our humanitarian impulses.
sentences.cn: 世界粮食银行展现出我们对于人道主义的努力.

sentences.en: And yet, in many ways, Socrates diagnoses very powerfully an important condition of modern democratic life with which we are all familiar.
sentences.cn: 但在很多方面，苏格拉底却也诊断了,非常有力且重要的,现在民主生活条件,那是我们都很熟悉的。

sentences.en: But in times like these, they resonate a bit more powerfully.
sentences.cn: 但这样的年代, 他们共鸣更有力.

sentences.en: Crack is a much cheaper, smokable form of cocaine which is powerfully addictive.
sentences.cn: 强效可卡因更便宜，可以吸食，极易使人上瘾。

sentences.en: Delight filled every bosom, for they saw that he was powerfully sympathetic.
sentences.cn: 每人心中都洋溢着欢乐, 因为他们看到,他极富同情心.

sentences.en: Extend your legs behind you powerfully, and internally rotate your thighs.
sentences.cn: 伸展腿部,大腿有力并向内转.

sentences.en: He felt himself so powerfully attracted to the scientific ideal.
sentences.cn: 他感到自己被这一科学理想十分强烈地吸引住了.

sentences.en: He is very powerfully built , ie has a large strong physique.
It's a play — painful, funny and powerfully acted.
sentences.cn: 这是一部悲喜交加、表演感人的戏剧。

sentences.en: Mobile phones of the latest fashion appeal powerfully to the young.
sentences.cn: 最新款式的手机很吸引年轻人.

sentences.en: The progress in science and technical will powerfully impel the education's development.
sentences.cn: 科学和技术的进步将有力地推动教育的发展.

sentences.en: The railway station smelt powerfully of cats and drains.
sentences.cn: 火车站上有冲鼻的猫味和臭水沟味。

sentences.en: VS - K Ingredients can powerfully adsorb water ion and seal water in skin.
sentences.cn: 同时VS-K成份能强效吸附水离子,锁住水分不流失.

sentences.en: Which touch points will help our idea drive change most powerfully?
sentences.cn: 哪些接触点将最有力地帮助我们的点子驱动改变?
